languages.text: "Лорд-капитан! Комендант "Обода Эриоха" докладывает: форпост исправно несет дозор за окрестностями мира-столицы. Вражеских кораблей или неавторизованных судов — не обнаружено".
languages.translation_comment: Вход, если отбуксировали станцию на Даргонус
Вход, если отбуксировали станцию на Даргонус

languages.text: "Lord Captain! The commander of Heriokh's Rim reports that the outpost is keeping a vigilant eye over the vicinity of the capital world. No enemy ships or unauthorised vessels have been detected."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан! Комендант "Обода Эриоха" докладывает: форпост исправно несет дозор за окрестностями мира-столицы. Вражеских кораблей или неавторизованных судов — не обнаружено".

"Lord Captain! The commander of Heriokh's Rim reports that the outpost is keeping a vigilant eye over the vicinity of the capital world. No enemy ships or unauthorised vessels have been detected."

languages.text: «¡Lord Capitán! El comandante del Borde de Heriokh informa de que el puesto tiene su mirada fija en los alrededores del mundo capital. No se han detectado naves no identificadas ni enemigas».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! The commander of Heriokh's Rim reports that the outpost is keeping a vigilant eye over the vicinity of the capital world. No enemy ships or unauthorised vessels have been detected."

traits.locale_text: «¡Lord Capitán! El comandante del Borde de Heriokh informa de que el puesto tiene su mirada fija en los alrededores del mundo capital. No se han detectado naves no identificadas ni enemigas».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン！ヘリオクのリムの司令からの報告によると、前哨基地は首都惑星を警戒しているとのことです。敵艦や無許可の船は発見されていません」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! The commander of Heriokh's Rim reports that the outpost is keeping a vigilant eye over the vicinity of the capital world. No enemy ships or unauthorised vessels have been detected."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン！ヘリオクのリムの司令からの報告によると、前哨基地は首都惑星を警戒しているとのことです。敵艦や無許可の船は発見されていません」

languages.text: “舰长大人！赫里奥卡之环的指挥官报告说，哨站正在对首都世界周边区域保持警戒，目前没有发现敌舰或未经授权的舰船。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! The commander of Heriokh's Rim reports that the outpost is keeping a vigilant eye over the vicinity of the capital world. No enemy ships or unauthorised vessels have been detected."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人！赫里奥卡之环的指挥官报告说，哨站正在对首都世界周边区域保持警戒，目前没有发现敌舰或未经授权的舰船。”

languages.text: "Lord Captain! Der Commander von Heriokhs Rand meldet, dass der Außenposten die Umgebung der Hauptwelt aufmerksam im Auge behält. Es wurden keine feindlichen oder nicht autorisierten Schiffe geortet."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! The commander of Heriokh's Rim reports that the outpost is keeping a vigilant eye over the vicinity of the capital world. No enemy ships or unauthorised vessels have been detected."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain! Der Commander von Heriokhs Rand meldet, dass der Außenposten die Umgebung der Hauptwelt aufmerksam im Auge behält. Es wurden keine feindlichen oder nicht autorisierten Schiffe geortet."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Le commandant de la Faille d'Heriokh signale que l'avant-poste surveille de près les environs du monde-capitale. Aucun vaisseau ennemi ou appareil non autorisé n'a été détecté pour le moment. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! The commander of Heriokh's Rim reports that the outpost is keeping a vigilant eye over the vicinity of the capital world. No enemy ships or unauthorised vessels have been detected."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Le commandant de la Faille d'Heriokh signale que l'avant-poste surveille de près les environs du monde-capitale. Aucun vaisseau ennemi ou appareil non autorisé n'a été détecté pour le moment. »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan! Heriokh'un Ağzı komutanı, karakolun başdünya civarını gözünü mütemadiyen açık tuttuğunu bildiriyor. Hiçbir düşman gemisi ya da izinsiz gemi tespit edilmemiş."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! The commander of Heriokh's Rim reports that the outpost is keeping a vigilant eye over the vicinity of the capital world. No enemy ships or unauthorised vessels have been detected."
